name: EsriAngularjsLegend
body:
### The Basics For those of you who are used to the Sliverlight legend from ESRI, switching to java script is painful! The out of the box legend does not do anything. This legend make the transition quite a bit easier. (Download the project and run the index.html file to see it in action.) With a few lines of code, you can have a legend that does the following: * Automatically adds map layers in tree view * Checkboxes to toggle layer visibility on/off (disabled when layer not in scale range) * Collapsible layers * Auto update legend based on graphic layers render or specified symbols ### Sample Usage **Define a controller to specify the layers to show in the legend** ``` ``` **Add the legend directive to your markup** ```
``` ### Required 3rd Party Library Dependencies * [angularjs](http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/angularjs/1.2.16/angular.min.js)(developed with 1.2.16) * [esri js](http://js.arcgis.com/3.10/) (developed with 3.10) * [font awesome](http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.css) (developed with 4.10) _I will soon depreciate the need for this library_ ### Supported Layers and Renderers _If a renderer is specified the legend will use that. If no renderer then symbols are used._ **Layers** * ArcGISDynamicMapServiceLayer * ArcGISTiledMapServieLayer * FeatureLayer * GraphicsLayer **Renderes** * Simple Renderer * UniqueValueRenderer * ClassBreaksRenderer ### Future Enhancements Coming Soon * Documentation Page * Collapse images under layer * Filter legend by typing tag name * Layer Opacity adjustment * Auto hide layers out of scale range ### Authors and Contributors Created by: @hewstone ### Support Have a problem or issue. Open a new issue and I'll look into it. If you add additional support for layers and/or renderers please share by issuing a pull request.
